Exaggerate: The claim that Democrats want to give illegal immigrants the right to vote is described as a "wildly inaccurate and baseless" immigration claim made by President Trump.
Contradict fact: The claim that Democrats want to give illegal immigrants the right to vote is stated to be against the law for noncitizens to vote in federal elections.
Lack enough support: The expert mentions that there is no evidence of a national or statewide push to allow immigrants in the country illegally to vote.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all Democrats want to give illegal immigrants the right to vote, which is not supported by evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert suggests that President Trump is making these claims to motivate his supporters to vote Republican in the midterm elections.
